ModMetaData.name: Gene Tools
ModMetaData.author: prkr
ModMetaData.description: Modding tools for creating xenos. Adds the ability to use a gene to assign custom body types, and restrict apparel to certain body types in xml. Also allows texture masking for bodies and heads so you can control what parts of a body are skin colored, or if they are at all. View usage instructions here: https://github.com/prkrdp/GeneTools/wiki
